summary: This is my first mod so please leave suggestions so I can get better!
descriptionHtml:
Adena the Follower is a unique follower.

Really Unique, she smells like pineapples at times.
She can be very creepy at time but most of the time she is joyful and happy.
She is very brave, I mean like really brave.
She is also aggressive, but not too aggressive.
There is really no proof that she is in fact a female but people make theories that she is because
of her female like voice.Â 
But she could be just a regular squeaker on Xbox Live.
Besides that theory, she is a great follower mod is your game feels not very fun at times and sometimes she can either brighten up your day or make it feel dark and creepy when in combat.

Her stats are:
LvL 60.
Daedric Armor, ench.
100 Skill Level on all Melee Stats.
And also 100 Skill on Heavy Armor.
and 10-20 on all other skills.
She also has healing spells.

[color=#ff0000][b]MAKE SURE TO PLEASE MAKE A COMMENT OF HOW I COULD DO BETTER AND GIVE ME A LIKE IF YOU THINK THIS IS A GOOD FIRST MOD!

[/b][/color]THANKS :D

[color=#ff0000]UPDATE![/color]
[color=#ff7700]We are bringing back in Adena soon for a makeover!
She will get removed of that pesky pineapple sent and replaced with a fresh new mango scent instead!
She will also be a NEW voice! Woop! Woop!
She just also might get a new armor and may be able to see what she looks like under all that armor :D
[/color][color=#ff0000]So Stay Tuned Guys for more Great Stuff![/color]
author: Talavok
